value.title: Maintain Layer Order for your Power BI Report
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can maintain layer order in Power BI. Sometimes, when we had added shapes or background images what happen is, if we click there by mistaken, it will be brought it to front and all of our visuals will overlap with the added shape. value.title: Power BI Tip - Hide Filter Pane From the Published Version of Power BI Report
